releases.title: Desktop Release 2.70.4
features: Injective (INJ) staking is now supported. Stake your coins with up to 17% APY.

releases.title: Desktop Release 2.69.2
features: Arbitrum L2 network has been integrated to Atomic Wallet.
Manage & Exchange Arbitrum ARB token in a secure way.
FlareDrops is now supported. Activate the drop in the wallet and enjoy monthly FLR drops.
Injective (INJ) coin is now supported.

releases.title: Desktop Release 2.68.8
features: Optimism L2 network has been integrated to Atomic Wallet.
Manage & Exchange Optimism OP token in a secure way.
MATIC ERC20 is available for staking.
Filecoin EVM is now supported.
Fake copies of genuine tokens don't have prices and charts now.

releases.title: Desktop Release 2.68.7
features: Optimism L2 network has been integrated to Atomic Wallet.
Manage & Exchange Optimism OP token in a secure way.
MATIC ERC20 is available for staking.
Filecoin EVM is now supported.
Fake copies of genuine tokens don't have prices and charts now.
fixes: The issue with app crashing on Windows7 has been resolved.

releases.title: Desktop Release 2.68.5
features: Optimism L2 network has been integrated to Atomic Wallet.
Manage & Exchange Optimism OP token in a secure way.
MATIC ERC20 is available for staking.
Filecoin EVM is now supported.
Fake copies of genuine tokens don't have prices and charts now.
fixes: Internet connection established alert is reflected again.

releases.title: Desktop Release 2.67.3
features: FET coin and staking are now supported. Stake your coins with up to 11 % APY.
AE was delisted.
Charts loading process has been optimized.
fixes: Staking balances displaying bug is fixed.

releases.title: Desktop Release 2.66.4
features: LUNA staking is now supported. Stake your coins with up to 7% APY.
FTM NFTs are now supported. View and manage your tokens in one place.
XMR View Key button is added to the XMR page. You can now easily contact support regarding your XMR issues.
NEO2 and GAS2 were delisted.
fixes: Staking balances displaying bug is fixed.

releases.title: Desktop Release 2.66.2
features: LUNA staking is now supported. Stake your coins with up to 7% APY.
FTM NFTs are now supported. View and manage your tokens in one place.
XMR View Key button is added to the XMR page. You can now easily contact support regarding your XMR issues.
NEO2 and GAS2 were delisted.
fixes: Monero XMR balance, history, sending and exchanging fixed.

releases.title: Desktop Release 2.65.3
features: Toncoin TON and KAVA are now supported. Manage your coins in a secure way.
KAVA staking is now supported. Stake your coins with up to 19% APY.
FTM tokens are now supported.
SMART and GRS were delisted.
fixes: Monero XMR balance, history, sending and exchanging fixed.

releases.title: Desktop Release 2.65.1
features: Toncoin TON and KAVA are now supported. Manage your coins in a secure way.
KAVA staking is now supported. Stake your coins with up to 19% APY.
FTM tokens are now supported.
SMART and GRS were delisted.
fixes: Monero XMR balance, history, sending and exchanging fixed.

releases.title: Desktop Release 2.65.0
features: Flare FLR staking supported. Stake your coins with up to 4,2% APY.

releases.title: Desktop Release 2.64.1
features: Flare FLR staking supported. Stake your coins with up to 4,2% APY.
Fantom network FTM supported. Manage your coins in a secure way.
Cosmos ATOM and Osmosis OSMO staking APY updated to 22%.
Membership rules improved. Receive cashback for exchanges by holding AWC BSC, AWC ETH, and AWC BNB.
fixes: Cosmos ATOM staking rewards are now shown in the wallet.

releases.title: Desktop Release 2.63.0
features: Flare network is now supported. Manage FLR and other tokens in a secure way.
fixes: MATIC Polygon and DOT sending to domains fixed.

releases.title: Desktop Release 2.62.3
features: Osmosis is now supported. Exchange and stake your OSMO with up to 11% APY.
AVAX-C NFTs are now supported. View and manage your tokens in one place.
Fake copies of genuine tokens now don't have price and chart.

releases.title: Desktop Release 2.61.1
features: HBAR staking is now supported. Stake your coins with up to 6.5% APY.
fixes: SOL and ICX staking is fixed.
Incoming transaction notifications are shown in the wallet.

releases.title: Desktop Release 2.60.3
features: For Windows users only: we have updated the app certificate, this is a standard procedure. Click on the 'Run anyway' button when launching your app.
Aptos APT is now supported. Manage your coins in a secure way.
Lido ETH staking is now supported. Stake your coins with up to 5.5% APY.
EGLD staking is now supported. Stake your coins with up to 12.21% APY.
New coins list is added to the exchange page.
NFT images that are stored in a decentralized file system (IPFS) are now displayed in the wallet.
fixes: NEAR balance when sending is fixed.
